```{r}
url <- "http://mlb.mlb.com/stats/sortable.jsp#elem=%5Bobject+Object%5D&tab_level=child&click_text=Sortable+Player+hitting&game_type='R'&season=2019&season_type=ALL&league_code='MLB'&sectionType=sp&statType=hitting&page=1&ts=1555430006178&split=&playerType=ALL&timeframe=&active_sw='Y'"
for (i in 1:n) {
  html <- read_html(url)
  html %>% html_nodes('.previous a') %>% html_text()
  newurl <- html %>% html_nodes('.previous') %>% html_attr('href')
  baseurl <- "https://www.the-nummbers.com"
  prevurl <- paste0(baseurl, newurl)
  prevBox <- boxoffice_scraper(preurl)
  str(preBox)
  url <- prevurl
  
}
```
